Desc.entry: The aim of Extra Care Schemes is to keep people as independent as possible in homes that are adaptable to changing needs and that allow people to get care services in their own home without having to move to get them. Guildford Grange is managed by Places for People and provides 40 2-bed flats for rent. Facilities include 2 communal lounges, assisted bathroom, hairdressing salon, laundry, hobby room, sensory garden and Bistro 55, a caf√© open to the public 7 days/week.
